name: Motorcycle Racing: Hill Up Cha
description:
Motorcycle Racing: Hill Up Challenge!!!
get ready for the extreme racing adventure and thrilling action. As a moto GP race and rider prepare yourself for the crazy freestyle motocross dirt bike stunt and daredevil drills. This is an amazing and ultimate bike race showdown, fling yourself into the world of stunts rider biking.
Features:
• Realistic Dirt & Beach Stunts.
• Smooth and intelligent control
• Realistic physics based Dirt Bikes
• Unique, rough and dangerous stunts
• Amazing 3D graphics & Environment
